duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement control systems for packaging and handling machines in Fargo.
Work closely with automation programmers and controls designers to ensure proper execution of machine's electrical design.
Verify electrical schematics and ensure proper assembly and wiring of electrical panels.
Power up and configure control components, assist with electrical troubleshooting, and troubleshoot PLC program using Rockwell Studio 5000 software.
Validate machine electrical system for factory acceptance testing (FAT) and travel to customer's facility for machine integration and site acceptance testing (SAT).
Complete service on installed equipment at customer's facility and communicate with customers in a positive and professional manner.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in Electrical Technology, Industrial Automation, Mechatronics Technology, or related field (or equivalent experience)
Experience within the automation industry or a manufacturing environment
